## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TrackedState](./blockly.renderedconnection_namespace.trackedstate_enum.md) | <p>Enum for different kinds of tracked states.</p><p>WILL\_TRACK means that this connection will add itself to the db on the next moveTo call it receives.</p><p>UNTRACKED means that this connection will not add itself to the database until setTracking(true) is explicitly called.</p><p>TRACKED means that this connection is currently being tracked.</p> |
